subject: Parenting
title: Healthy Boundaries
description: A quick win: understand Healthy Boundaries.

hook.text: A child with no bedtime stays up until midnight and melts down at school the next day.

discovery.text: Children test limits to discover where the edges are. Finding them provides security.
